roles.jobtitle: Knowledge Content Owner (Alerting and Event Detection)
description: Oversaw all aspect of alert and event detection software offering (estimated benefit of ~$100m/yr), covering all support tier, R&D, deployment, stewardship, licensing and stakeholder management.
Managed in-house and contractor development team in line with continuous improvement philosophy and long-term process control strategy.
Modernized SDLC and work processes through introduction of version control, standardization and automation.
Provided mentorship and training to engineers globally on the technology.
Assigned to Baton Rouge, LA, USA for 2+ months, rotating between various units in both chemicals and refinery sites.
Exposed to AspenTech DMC, Honeywell TDC and Experion DCS, process control and working relationships between applications team with other stakeholders on-site.
Provided alert software deployment, tier 2 troubleshooting, upgrade and migration support worldwide.
Led and implemented enhancements and end-user tool development projects.
Provided data analytic and business intelligence tools and services to drive business decisions and improve efficiency.
Trained remote/on-site personnel and provide mentoring to new employees/interns.
Main tech stack: Inductive Automation's Ignition platform, Python scripting, Java module, MSSQL back-end, SSRS/PowerBI reporting. VBA/PowerShell/batch scripts for data engineering/pipeline.
